title: Ucrânia avisa que Rússia prepara lançamento de míssil intercontinental
cleaned_sentences: "In order to press and demonstrately intimidate Ukraine, as well as the Member States of the European Union (EU) and NATO, Russia's aggressor state intends to make a 'training and combat' release of the Intercontinental RS-24 YARS Ballistic Missile on the night of May 19," said Gur on the Telegram network.

According to the information service, the Missile, equipped with training ammunition, "was ordered to be launched from a mobile terrestrial complex by the 433rd Regiment of the 42nd Division of the 31st Army of Strategic Missile Forces."
The launch site, he needed, is an area near the Sverdlovsk Russian Sverdlovsk village in the Urals.
The girl said that the scope of this three -phase missile is over 10,000 kilometers.

Russia and Ukraine held on Friday in Istanbul the first direct negotiations since 2022, marked by the absence of Russian President Vladimir Putin, who sent a technical delegation to dialogue with the representation of Kiev, led by Defense Minister Rustem Umarov.
The meeting did not produce significant results, and the Russian party sent to a response after the Ukrainian requirement of a 30-day ceasefire before negotiations about the conflict.
United States President Donald Trump will speak next Monday with Russian and Ukrainian counterparts, and then with several NATO leaders.
European partners plan to announce a new package of sanctions to Moscow on Tuesday due to Kremlin's impasse in peace negotiations.
